aboutMe.theBeginningMsg: My connection with programming dates back to middle school. Since then, I've dabbled in many programming languages, but the one that has become the basis of my adventure is the C++ language.
aboutMe.currentStateMsg: I am a Full-Stack Web Developer. I am involved in developing applications that are critical to business management. In addition, I am currently studying computer science.
aboutMe.futurePlansMsg: My plan for the future is to expand into the development of mobile applications and software that is as simple as possible and will make users' daily lives easier.

projects.realMsg: REAL is a simple 2D game specially designed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 in one week.
projects.pongMsg: Pong Mobile is a replica of the classic game Pong. The project was made using the Unity engine.
projects.chatAppMsg: ChatApp is a simple online chat replica with basic functionality, implemented in the Laravel framework.
